editions.flavor: The leyline buried in Krustal shatters awake again, infusing dauntless souls with freezing clarity.
The leyline buried in Krustal shatters awake again, infusing dauntless souls with freezing clarity.
The rivers of Wool Brook flow with depths concealed beneath reflections too perfect to trust.
The rivers of Wool Brook flow with depths concealed beneath reflections too perfect to trust.
The tides and waves thrash again as serpent and tortoise entwined awaken from their slumber.

effect:
**On Enter:** You gain the Fractured Memories mastery. Then you may pay (2). If you do, **summon** a Memorite Blade token.

effect:
**Merlin Lineage**

[Sheen 8+] **On Enter:** You may banish a regalia card from your material deck. If you do, draw a card and put a **preparation** counter on your champion.

[Sheen 24+] At the beginning of your end phase, look at target opponent's memory and banish a card from it. Until the end of that opponent's next turn, they may activate that card.
effect_raw:
Merlin Lineage

[Sheen 8+] On Enter: You may banish a regalia card from your material deck. If you do, draw a card and put a preparation counter on your champion.

[Sheen 24+] At the beginning of your end phase, look at target opponent's memory and banish a card from it. Until the end of that opponent's next turn, they may activate that card.
name: Merlin, Brilliant Vestige

If you do, draw a card and put a preparation counter on your champion.Sheen 24+ At the beginning of your end phase, look at target opponent's memory and banish a card from it. Until the end of that opponent's next turn, they may activate that card.

editions.flavor: A little warmth for those who venture the darkness alone.

effect: If your champion would take damage, you may banish CARDNAME. If you do, prevent 1 of that damage. Put a **preparation** counter on your champion if damage was prevented this way.

name: Assassin's Mantle

result_editions.flavor: A little warmth for those who venture the darkness alone.

editions.flavor: In a lovely garden, nestled among beds of bright flowers, lies a peculiar amulet—though reaching it may not be so simple.

"An occultist's desperate pursuit for immortality. However, what came back was but only a husk."
– Si Ma Hui, Hermit Sage
In a lovely garden, nestled among beds of bright flowers, lies a peculiar amulet—though reaching it may not be so simple.
"An occultist's desperate pursuit for immortality. However, what came back was but only a husk." — Si Ma Hui, Hermit Sage

"An alchemist's impossible wish to bring his dearly departed beloved back from the other side."
— Astarte, Celestial Dawn
In a lovely garden, nestled among beds of bright flowers, lies a peculiar amulet—though reaching it may not be so simple.

effect:
[Merlin Bonus] [Sheen 15+] This card costs 3 less to activate.

[Merlin Bonus] Your champion becomes all class types of target opponent's champion in addition to their other types. Then look at that opponent's material deck. You may materialize a regalia card from among them, ignoring its elemental requirements. *(The class changing effect lasts indefinitely.)*
effect_raw:
[Merlin Bonus] [Sheen 15+] This card costs 3 less to activate.

[Merlin Bonus] Your champion becomes all class types of target opponent's champion in addition to their other types. Then look at that opponent's material deck. You may materialize a regalia card from among them, ignoring its elemental requirements. (The class changing effect lasts indefinitely.)
name: Materialize the Soul
effect_html: Merlin Bonus Sheen 15+ This card costs 3 less to activate.Merlin Bonus Your champion becomes all class types of target opponent's champion in addition to their other types. Then look at that opponent's material deck. You may materialize a regalia card from among them, ignoring its elemental requirements. (The class changing effect lasts indefinitely.)

editions.flavor: "I know what you are, Merlin Veritor. You are not worthy of Excalibur, not even in your guise."

effect: **On Ally Kill:** Return the killed ally from its owner's graveyard to the field under your control rested. It becomes a Spirit in addition to its other types.
effect_raw: On Ally Kill: Return the killed ally from its owner's graveyard to the field under your control rested. It becomes a Spirit in addition to its other types.
name: Possessed Reaping

result_editions.flavor: "I know what you are, Merlin Veritor. You are not worthy of Excalibur, not even in your guise."

effect_html: On Ally Kill: Return the killed ally from its owner's graveyard to the field under your control rested. It becomes a Spirit in addition to its other types.

effect:
**Prepare 1** 

Terminus gets +1 [POWER] for every four **sheen** counters on your Fractured Memories.

**On Hit:** If Terminus was **prepared**, double the amount of **sheen** counters on your Fractured Memories and put Terminus into its owner's memory.
effect_raw:
Prepare 1 

Terminus gets +1 POWER for every four sheen counters on your Fractured Memories.

On Hit: If Terminus was prepared, double the amount of sheen counters on your Fractured Memories and put Terminus into its owner's memory.
name: Spirit Blade: Terminus
effect_html: Prepare 1 Terminus gets +1 for every four sheen counters on your Fractured Memories.On Hit: If Terminus was prepared, double the amount of sheen counters on your Fractured Memories and put Terminus into its owner's memory.
